Context: The text advocates for Indigenous education in Canada and mentions that the college has an Indigenous Education Strategy. The strategy recognizes the inherent Aboriginal and Treaty right to education as established in the 1996 Report of the Royal Commission on Aboriginal Peoples (RCAP). The college encourages readers to read the full strategy, learn more about their land acknowledgment, and sign up for updates about application deadlines, college news, events, tours, and more. They provide contact information: a phone number 416-415-2000, TTY number 1-877-515-5559, email address ask.george@georgebrown.ca, and social media hub. The text also includes a disclaimer that the information in the website is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as an offer or warranty. No specific program information was mentioned in the text.
